markdownRemark.html:
A Quick Bio

Sasha's LinkedIn

During last week's fireside chat, founding engineer Ethan Ding spoke to Sasha Iatsenia, a Google Product Manager and former Head of product at Kiwibot. Unlike many of the previous speakers we’ve had on the Edith fireside series, Sasha didn’t come from a conventional background, in fact he never finished college. Sasha joined Kiwibot as an intern in 2017 at the company’s foundation and grew into head or product over 2 years, before leaving to join Google.

Due to popular demand and the generosity of Sasha, we've been able to make this fireside publically available, watch the talk here!

frontmatter.title: Fireside with Google Product Manager Sasha Iatsenia
frontmatter.excerpt: Ethan and Sasha talk about working in product management, startup vs big tech culture, and recruiting at Google
frontmatter.author: Ethan Ding
